name: ShoreTalk
0:
”Alexa, launch shore talk.”
”Alexa, open shore talk.”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: shore talk
des:
Listen to the latest on demand content from 103 the Shore, Coffee with Kelley or Shore Talk.
Once enabled, just say: "Alexa, open shore talk" and Alexa will guide you from there!
After that, you can say things like:
 * "Listen to on demand"
 * "Resume"
 * "On demand options"
When playing audio, you can say:
 * Alexa, pause
When playing on-demand content, you can skip to an older show by saying:
 * Alexa, next
And navigate to the previous segment by saying:
 * Alexa, go back
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
